title: Session Event
description: An event within a pytest session.

oneOf.description: A node was collected (directory, module or suite).
A test case finished. Finished event is always emitted even if test is skipped or failed.
A test case setup step finished. Setup step is always emitted even if test is skipped.
A test case teardown step finished. Teardown step is always emitted even if test is skipped or failed.
A test case call step finished. Call step may not be emitted for skipped tests or tests with setup errors.
The test session started. This is always the first event emitted.
The test session finished. This is always the last event emitted.
